hero.title: Professional Oral Rehabilitation and Dental Aesthetics
hero.subtitle: Improve your oral health and restore confidence in your smile with personalized treatments in prosthetics, smile design, and dental cleanings.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi, I’m Dr. {{name}}, a dentist and prosthodontist specializing in oral rehabilitation and dental aesthetics. My mission is to help patients improve their oral health and feel confident about their smiles through personalized and high-quality care.
about.paragraph2: I have extensive experience in smile design, dental prosthetics, and deep cleanings, always aiming for functional and aesthetic results that enhance each person’s quality of life.
about.paragraph3: I work from my own dental office, a modern and welcoming space where every patient receives personalized attention tailored to their specific needs, with a comprehensive focus on oral well-being.
about.paragraph4: My commitment is to provide ethical, human-centered, and professional care, using the latest techniques and technology to achieve healthy, natural, and harmonious smiles.

oralRehabilitation.title: Oral Rehabilitation
oralRehabilitation.description: Restoring function and aesthetics through personalized treatments that improve chewing, speech, and appearance, using prostheses and advanced dental techniques.

dentalAesthetics.title: Dental Aesthetics
dentalAesthetics.description: Enhancing the appearance of your smile with treatments such as teeth whitening, veneers, and aesthetic restorations tailored to your facial harmony.

preventiveCare.title: Preventive Dental Care
preventiveCare.description: Helping you maintain optimal oral health through early diagnosis, regular cleanings, and education on daily hygiene routines.

prosthodontics.title: Prosthodontics
prosthodontics.description: Designing and placing high-quality dental prostheses to replace missing teeth and restore natural function and aesthetics.

tools.title: Explore My Clinic
tools.subtitle: A visual tour of the facilities and spaces dedicated to your oral health.
